Unicron/Sun Crusher/Reflector:




Unicron flew down hard, avoiding the incoming missile from FZ and one from 
Prowl, the other exploding but having the same effect as before.  He raised 
his arms again, firing two energy-signature seeking missiles at FZ's abdomen, 
and fired three optic blasts at his chest.

---

Sun Crusher revolved the machine gun mounted on his turret, firing off 25 
armor-piercing rounds at Prowl's midsection.

---

Reflector flew up into the air, firing a stream of acid at FZ and with his 
wrist cannon fired a single energy-signature missile at Prowl.
